solution_line_template: She has gotten {haircuts_for_free} haircuts to get {num_free_haircuts} free ones because {haircuts_per_free} x {num_free_haircuts} = <<{haircuts_for_free}={haircuts_for_free}>>{haircuts_for_free}

She has gotten {haircuts_towards_next_free} haircuts towards her 6th free one because {haircuts_per_free} - {haircuts_away_from_next_free} = <<{haircuts_per_free}-{haircuts_away_from_next_free}={haircuts_towards_next_free}>>{haircuts_towards_next_free}
